mapper.select: select finishorderflag from adstatusofuser where userunique=#{userUnique} and period=(select max(period) from adofuser where userunique=#{userUnique})

select FINISHADFLAG as status,approveduser.username as name,approveduser.userid as userId from adstatusofuser , (select userid,userunique from gamegroupmember where groupname=(select groupname from gamegroupmember where userunique=#{userUnique})) u ,approveduser where adstatusofuser.userunique= u.userunique and u.userid=approveduser.userid and adstatusofuser.period= (select max(period) from adofuser where userunique=#{userUnique})
mapper.insert: insert into adstatusofuser(userunique, period, finishadflag, finishorderflag, chooseorderflag) values (#{userUnique},#{period},#{finishadflag}, #{finishorderflag},#{chooseorderflag})
